PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ConcreteElementQuantityGeneral
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Bill-of-Quantity properties common to different types of precast concrete elements. The Pset is used to express the total bulk quantities per element. The quantities may include the concrete, reinforcement, and different kinds of accessories. The Pset can be used by a number of subtypes of IfcBuildingElement. Note: Bulk quantities for parts used for surface finish, tiles, bricks, etc. are included as area quantities in Pset_ConcreteElementSurfaceFinishQuantityGeneral.

PropertyDef.Name: TotalConcreteQuantity
PropertyDef.Definition: The total bulk quantity of concrete used for the precast concrete element expressed as the volume of concrete in cubic meter (m3).

PropertyDef.Name: TotalRebarQuantity
RebarSteelGrade
PropertyDef.Definition: The rebar steel grade (e.g. 'A500HW') for which the total quantity is specified.

PropertyDef.Name: RebarSteelGradeSpecificationReference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference to steel grade standard specification.

PropertyDef.Name: RebarDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The rebar size (nominal diameter) for which the total quantity is specified.

PropertyDef.Name: RebarQuantity
PropertyDef.Definition: The total quantity of rebar for the specified bar size expressed as the mass measure of rebar in kg.

The total bulk quantity of rebar per size used for the precast concrete element expressed as the mass measure of rebar in kg. Note: several complex properties of this type, one for each rebar size, may be attached to the Pset.

PropertyDef.Name: TotalAccessoryQuantity
AccessoryType
PropertyDef.Definition: Type designation of the accessory according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessoryGroupCode
PropertyDef.Definition: Classification code of the accessory type group according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessoryTypeSpecificationReference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference to the accessory standard specification.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessoryDescription
PropertyDef.Definition: Short textual description of the accessory.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessoryMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material designation according to local classification standards.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessoryMaterialSpecificationReference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference to the accessory material standard specification.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessorySize
PropertyDef.Definition: Size designation according to local classification standards or manufacturer practices.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessoryQuantityByNumberOfItems
PropertyDef.Definition: The total quantity of accessories of the specified accessory type expressed as number of items.

PropertyDef.Name: AccessoryQuantityByWeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The total quantity of accessories of the specified accessory type expressed as mass measure in kg.

The total bulk quantity of accessories per type of accessory for the precast concrete element. The quantity may be expressed as number of items or mass measure in kg or both. Note: several complex properties of this type, one for each accessory type, may be attached to the Pset.
